targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    Service,
    sum(NumMetrics) as TotalNumMetrics
FROM (
    -- From the sum table
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND ServiceName in ($service)
    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the gauge table
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE $timeFilter
        AND ServiceName in ($service)

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the summary table
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
    WHERE $timeFilter
        AND ServiceName in ($service)

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the histogram table
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
    WHERE $timeFilter
        AND ServiceName in ($service)

    GROUP BY Service
) as combined
GROUP BY Service
ORDER BY TotalNumMetrics DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=New dashboard, user=1 */
SELECT
    Service,
    sum(NumMetrics) as TotalNumMetrics
FROM (
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1741650384, 3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1741671984, 3)
    AND ServiceName in ('')
    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1741650384, 3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1741671984, 3)
        AND ServiceName in ('')

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1741650384, 3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1741671984, 3)
        AND ServiceName in ('')

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1741650384, 3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1741671984, 3)
    
    GROUP BY Service
) as combined
GROUP BY Service
ORDER BY TotalNumMetrics DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    MetricName,
    groupArray(TableName) as Tables
FROM (
    -- From the sum table
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_sum' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_sum
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND ServiceName in ($service)
           AND MetricName ilike '%${searchText:raw}%'

    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the gauge table
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_gauge' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE $timeFilter
       AND ServiceName in ($service)
       AND MetricName ilike '%${searchText:raw}%'

    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the summary table
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_summary' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_summary
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND ServiceName in ($service)   
           AND MetricName ilike '%${searchText:raw}%'
    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the histogram table
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_histogram' as TableName 
    FROM otel_metrics_histogram
    WHERE $timeFilter
       AND ServiceName in ($service)
              AND MetricName ilike '%${searchText:raw}%'

) as all_metrics
GROUP BY MetricName
ORDER BY MetricName ASC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2 Copy', user='2' */
SELECT
    MetricName,
    groupArray(TableName) as Tables
FROM (
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_sum' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_sum
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751307011,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751310611,3)
    AND ServiceName in ('ayoconnect-grafana','ayoconnect-otel','b14-003-hz-mk8s','base1-clickhouse','bureau-grafana','bureau-otel','cloudcosmos-grafana','cloudcosmos-otel','dmart-grafana','dmart-otel','dpd0-grafana','dpd0-otel','glomopay-grafana','glomopay-otel','greyamp-grafana','greyamp-otel','healthtap-grafana','healthtap-otel','kolo-grafana','kolo-otel','kulu-grafana','kulu-otel','liveheats-grafana','liveheats-otel','peach-grafana','peach-otel','pratilipi-grafana','pratilipi-otel','probe42-grafana','probe42-otel','quintype-grafana','quintype-otel','scout-collector','zinc-grafana','zinc-otel')
           AND MetricName ilike '%queries%'

    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_gauge' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751307011,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751310611,3)
       AND ServiceName in ('ayoconnect-grafana','ayoconnect-otel','b14-003-hz-mk8s','base1-clickhouse','bureau-grafana','bureau-otel','cloudcosmos-grafana','cloudcosmos-otel','dmart-grafana','dmart-otel','dpd0-grafana','dpd0-otel','glomopay-grafana','glomopay-otel','greyamp-grafana','greyamp-otel','healthtap-grafana','healthtap-otel','kolo-grafana','kolo-otel','kulu-grafana','kulu-otel','liveheats-grafana','liveheats-otel','peach-grafana','peach-otel','pratilipi-grafana','pratilipi-otel','probe42-grafana','probe42-otel','quintype-grafana','quintype-otel','scout-collector','zinc-grafana','zinc-otel')
       AND MetricName ilike '%queries%'

    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_summary' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_summary
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751307011,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751310611,3)
    AND ServiceName in ('ayoconnect-grafana','ayoconnect-otel','b14-003-hz-mk8s','base1-clickhouse','bureau-grafana','bureau-otel','cloudcosmos-grafana','cloudcosmos-otel','dmart-grafana','dmart-otel','dpd0-grafana','dpd0-otel','glomopay-grafana','glomopay-otel','greyamp-grafana','greyamp-otel','healthtap-grafana','healthtap-otel','kolo-grafana','kolo-otel','kulu-grafana','kulu-otel','liveheats-grafana','liveheats-otel','peach-grafana','peach-otel','pratilipi-grafana','pratilipi-otel','probe42-grafana','probe42-otel','quintype-grafana','quintype-otel','scout-collector','zinc-grafana','zinc-otel')   
           AND MetricName ilike '%queries%'
    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_histogram' as TableName 
    FROM otel_metrics_histogram
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751307011,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751310611,3)
       AND ServiceName in ('ayoconnect-grafana','ayoconnect-otel','b14-003-hz-mk8s','base1-clickhouse','bureau-grafana','bureau-otel','cloudcosmos-grafana','cloudcosmos-otel','dmart-grafana','dmart-otel','dpd0-grafana','dpd0-otel','glomopay-grafana','glomopay-otel','greyamp-grafana','greyamp-otel','healthtap-grafana','healthtap-otel','kolo-grafana','kolo-otel','kulu-grafana','kulu-otel','liveheats-grafana','liveheats-otel','peach-grafana','peach-otel','pratilipi-grafana','pratilipi-otel','probe42-grafana','probe42-otel','quintype-grafana','quintype-otel','scout-collector','zinc-grafana','zinc-otel')
              AND MetricName ilike '%queries%'

) as all_metrics
GROUP BY MetricName
ORDER BY MetricName ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
--SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

select TimeUnix as EntryTime, * from $table where $timeFilter
and ServiceName in ($service)
and MetricName = $metricName
order by TimeUnix DESC LIMIT 5
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2', user='2' */


select TimeUnix as EntryTime, * from base14.otel_metrics_sum where TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751306860,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751310460,3)
and ServiceName in ('ayoconnect-grafana','ayoconnect-otel','b14-003-hz-mk8s','base1-clickhouse','bureau-grafana','bureau-otel','cloudcosmos-grafana','cloudcosmos-otel','dmart-grafana','dmart-otel','dpd0-grafana','dpd0-otel','glomopay-grafana','glomopay-otel','greyamp-grafana','greyamp-otel','healthtap-grafana','healthtap-otel','kolo-grafana','kolo-otel','kulu-grafana','kulu-otel','liveheats-grafana','liveheats-otel','peach-grafana','peach-otel','pratilipi-grafana','pratilipi-otel','probe42-grafana','probe42-otel','quintype-grafana','quintype-otel','scout-collector','zinc-grafana','zinc-otel')
and MetricName = 'chi_clickhouse_event_AggregationHashTablesInitializedAsTwoLevel'
order by TimeUnix DESC LIMIT 5

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, avg(Value) FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter
AND ServiceName in ($service)
AND MetricName = $metricName
 GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2 Copy', user='2' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (5 * 1000)) * (5 * 1000)) as t, avg(Value) FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751307011,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751310611,3)
AND ServiceName in ('ayoconnect-grafana','ayoconnect-otel','b14-003-hz-mk8s','base1-clickhouse','bureau-grafana','bureau-otel','cloudcosmos-grafana','cloudcosmos-otel','dmart-grafana','dmart-otel','dpd0-grafana','dpd0-otel','glomopay-grafana','glomopay-otel','greyamp-grafana','greyamp-otel','healthtap-grafana','healthtap-otel','kolo-grafana','kolo-otel','kulu-grafana','kulu-otel','liveheats-grafana','liveheats-otel','peach-grafana','peach-otel','pratilipi-grafana','pratilipi-otel','probe42-grafana','probe42-otel','quintype-grafana','quintype-otel','scout-collector','zinc-grafana','zinc-otel')
AND MetricName = 'chi_clickhouse_event_ArenaAllocBytes'
 GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2 Copy', user='2' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) as t, avg(Value) FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751307011,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751310611,3)
AND ServiceName in ('ayoconnect-grafana','ayoconnect-otel','b14-003-hz-mk8s','base1-clickhouse','bureau-grafana','bureau-otel','cloudcosmos-grafana','cloudcosmos-otel','dmart-grafana','dmart-otel','dpd0-grafana','dpd0-otel','glomopay-grafana','glomopay-otel','greyamp-grafana','greyamp-otel','healthtap-grafana','healthtap-otel','kolo-grafana','kolo-otel','kulu-grafana','kulu-otel','liveheats-grafana','liveheats-otel','peach-grafana','peach-otel','pratilipi-grafana','pratilipi-otel','probe42-grafana','probe42-otel','quintype-grafana','quintype-otel','scout-collector','zinc-grafana','zinc-otel')
AND MetricName = 'chi_clickhouse_event_ArenaAllocBytes'
 GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT ServiceName
FROM (
	SELECT ServiceName
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	UNION ALL

	SELECT ServiceName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	UNION ALL

	SELECT ServiceName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	UNION ALL

	SELECT ServiceName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
)
ORDER BY ServiceName
list.label: Service
list.name: service
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT ServiceName
FROM (
	SELECT ServiceName
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	UNION ALL

	SELECT ServiceName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	UNION ALL

	SELECT ServiceName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	UNION ALL

	SELECT ServiceName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
)
ORDER BY ServiceName

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT MetricName
FROM (
    SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
   	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
    
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
    
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
    AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
	
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
) AS all_metrics
ORDER BY MetricName
list.label: Metric
list.name: metricName
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT MetricName
FROM (
    SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
   	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
    
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
    
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
    AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
	
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
) AS all_metrics
ORDER BY MetricName
